title: Fluent English Speaker w/Sales Experience
job_overview:
International communications and sales agency looking for fluent English speakers with some sales experience (customer support experience is a bonus!)

Job involves speaking with subscribers and upselling content.

Remuneration in 1 month 1 (probation) is $500-$1000 and up to $3000 from month two onwards

Apply to the position in this form and add “sparkling water” in the "Motivation section" to prove that you read the description.
